channel.title: [PI] 3 Easy PI questions [PI]
channel.description:
oke ppl
question 1#
If someone have chaotic maul in client it freeze client and if u restart client and logg in u freeze again..
is this a model Error do i only have to change the model?
Question 2#
If i close the server for a restart or something a giant roll back appears how to fix this.
Question 3#
How to add Objects to a Pi
and how to make a portal in PI go anywhere

item.title: [PI] 3 Easy PI questions [PI]
item.dc:creator: @yash yash
item.description:
@yash wrote:

  1. It’s a problem with the model.
  2. It always happens in a PI I havnt figured out how to change this myself, What i advise is make a command that kicks everyone ::kickall. If they get kicked it saves their game, you can then restert it.
  3. To add a object go to object SRC–>SERVER–>WORLD–>OBJECTMANAGER.JAVA And search for

private int[][] customObjects = {{}}; public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) {
Under that add objects as

		c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, xxxx, yyyy, 1, 10); // Bank's at donator island..

To make a object move you by clicking it.
go to SRC–>SERVER–>MODEL–>PLAYERS–>ACTIONHANDLER.JAVA

SEARCH FOR

public void firstClickObject(int objectType, int obX, int obY) { c.clickObjectType = 0;

[code]UNDER THAT USE AS

	case 9999: // this is the object id, portal id for you.
	c.getPA().startTeleport(xxxx, yyyy, 0, "modern");
	}
	break;[/code]

[center]
[font=times new roman][size=16pt]Next time
Please
Consider
Using
The
Search
Button[/size][/font][/center]

Read full topic
